attributes.action: Remove Explosives from fireworks to stop animals from suffering and injury.
attributes.additional_details:
As the years have rolled by , fireworks have got louder and louder and are no longer a joy for many people for various reasons. The explosives have caused so much pain to animal lovers who have to console and watch their beloved pets suffer with anxiety and fear.
November 5th is no longer for one night only .It goes on for days and days and people are getting more and more agitated with the uncertainty of how many days they have to suffer with anxiety themselves ,trying to protect their animals
attributes.background:
Countless petitions have been ignored over the years by politicians .
Pets suffer considerable anxiety , sustain injuries and many die of fear. It is heartbreaking to see.
Wildlife suffers too.
I ask you to compromise by making it law to remove all Explosives from fireworks to be used in The UK .

rejection.details:
It is unclear as to how explosives can be removed for fireworks and them still function in any way as fireworks.

There are also a couple of other petitions already open which deal with this subject in different way which you may wish to sign:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/738192 

and

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/739674
